data.title: Want free pizza for 1 year? Here's how 25 people can get it at new Pizza Hut in Salisbury
data.meta_description: Pizza Hut has opened a third location in the city of Salisbury. Find out how you can win free pizza for one year at the franchise's newest location.
data.text:
What was once nonexistent in Salisbury is now slowly but surely taking over the business world.

That's right, Pizza Hut, the international franchise founded in 1958, has now opened a third location in the popular Eastern Shore town. Doors officially opened to the public on Friday, Aug. 4, with a grand opening celebration set to take place soon.

To celebrate the grand opening of its brand-new location at 1306 S Salisbury Blvd., in Sea Gull Square, Flynn Restaurant Group LLC (FRG) is awarding the first 25 customers in-line with free pizza for a year on Friday, Aug. 25. Redeemable punch cards will be issued to the first 25 people in line when the dining room opens.

Salisbury's brand-new Pizza Hut features the chain’s signature menu items, as well as enhancements such as a fresh and improved look, with a more modern, compact design, and bold graphics on the interior and exterior of the new smaller design concept.

NEW BUSINESS: West Ocean City welcomes new Mexican restaurant, The Ugly Pie reopens | What's Going There

Pizza Hut locations owned and operated by Flynn Restaurant Group nearby include an additional Salisbury location at 830 E. Main St., in addition to locations in Bear, Dover, Seaford and Smyrna in Delaware. The newest Salisbury location, now open from 10:30 a.m. to 11 p.m. seven days a week, is projected to add 15 new jobs to the local economy.

“Flynn Restaurant Group is excited to bring the Pizza Hut dining experience to Salisbury,” said Randy Bates, vice president of marketing. “We approach each of our new locations as an investment in the community through job creation and philanthropic initiatives. We look forward to delivering great tasting food and impeccable customer service to new guests in Wicomico County.”

SALISBURY: Downtown Salisbury getting big changes: Here's what's ahead for the vital area

Salisbury locations

Salisbury now has a total of three separate Pizza Hut locations sprinkled throughout town. Hungry patrons can choose from any of the following:

Pizza Hut - 1306 S Salisbury, Suite 172

Pizza Hut - 830 E. Main St.

Pizza Hut Express - 125 East North Pointe Drive, Target - T1233

The following restrictions apply to the giveaway:

Offer valid only at Pizza Hut of Salisbury, 1306 S Salisbury Blvd., owned and operated by Flynn Restaurant Group.

Winners to receive two complimentary specialty or up to 3-topping large pizzas per month (24) for one year.

Valid on Hand Tossed, Thin ‘N Crispy and Original Pan crusts only.

Pizzas may be redeemed separately or together.

Cannot be redeemed outside of respective month.

Carryout only.

Limit one certificate per party.

Cannot be combined with any other coupons, offers or discounts.
